subject: Sprint 12 midweek update and milestone coordination
body:
Hi team,

Quick status: Sprint 12 is on track overall. Two stories are at risk due to API rate-limit testing, but we have a workaround in validation.

Milestones
- Feature flag rollout to 10%: Wed EOD
- API performance test completion: Thu noon
- UAT sign-off window: Thu 2–5 pm
- Release candidate tag: Fri 10 am

Owners and asks
- Alex Lee: Finalize dashboard empty-state copy and push to Jira by today 4 pm.
- Priya Natarajan: Confirm rate-limit test matrix and post results in Confluence by Thu 11 am.
- Samir Gomez: Coordinate with SRE on canary thresholds; share notes in the Teams channel by Thu EOD.
- Mei Chen: Prepare release notes draft and attach to the Confluence page by Fri 9 am.

Risks/Blockers
- API rate-limit variance in staging vs. prod-like: Mitigation in progress; decision point Thu 1 pm.
- Canary alert noise: SRE tuning in flight; thresholds to be reviewed in standup tomorrow.

Coordination
- Please update Jira ticket statuses before daily standup.
- Use the Teams channel for quick questions; decisions will be captured on the Confluence page.
- The release review is Fri 9:30–10:00 am on Teams; join from the channel meeting link.

Resources
- Jira board: see link below
- Confluence sprint page: see link below
- Teams channel: see link below

If anything looks off, ping me in Teams. Thanks!

— Jordan Rivera
